select mr.id as id, ph.proprietor_id as propertyId, ph.project_id as projectId, h.building_id as buildingId, ph.house_num as houseNum, p.`name` as proprietorName, mr.start_date as startDate, mr.end_date as endDate, mr.use_amount as useAmount, mr.read_date as readDate, mr.pre_num, mr.curr_num, (select count(tmr.id) from t_meter_record tmr where tmr.project_id = mr.project_id and tmr.house_num = mr.house_num and tmr.start_date = mr.start_date and tmr.end_date = mr.end_date )as isRead from t_proprietor_house ph left join t_meter_record mr on ph.project_id = mr.project_id and ph.house_num = mr.house_num left join t_proprietor p on p.id = ph.proprietor_id left join t_house h on h.project_id = ph.project_id and h.house_num = ph.house_num
${pager.mysqlQueryCondition}

select count(1) from( select ph.proprietor_id from t_proprietor_house ph left join t_meter_record mr on ph.project_id = mr.project_id and ph.house_num = mr.house_num left join t_proprietor p on p.id = ph.proprietor_id left join t_house h on h.project_id = ph.project_id and h.house_num = ph.house_num
) t

SELECT mr.id, pb.id as building_id, pb.name as proprietorName, pb.project_id as projectId, mr.pre_num, mr.curr_num, mr.end_date, mr.start_date, mr.use_amount, mr.read_date, (select COUNT(ph.id) from t_proprietor_house ph,t_house h where ph.project_id=h.project_id and h.building_id=pb.id ) as onwerCount FROM t_project_building pb LEFT JOIN t_meter_record mr ON pb.id = mr.building_id AND mr.meter_owner = 2
${pager.mysqlQueryCondition}

select count(1) from( SELECT mr.id FROM t_project_building pb LEFT JOIN t_meter_record mr ON pb.id = mr.building_id AND mr.meter_owner = 2
